DOC.brief_summary: Crisis management important operating room practice non-technical skill acknowledge key ensure patient safety situation . Unfortunately , difficult find instructors appropriate experience . A peer-led team debriefing lead team self rather external expert instructor remain reflective process . Incorporating peer-led debriefing compare expert-led debriefing may increase access interprofessional crisis resource management course use simulation . The goal study observe effect interprofessional peer-led team debrief change performance non-technical skill team performance compare `` gold standard '' expert-led debrief performance non-technical skill simulate operating room crisis . The investigator hypothesize interprofessional peer-led debriefing improve performance non-technical skill team simulate intraoperative crisis management improvement equivalent `` gold standard '' expert-led debriefing .
DOC.brief_title: Peer Debriefing Versus Instructor Debriefing Interprofessional Simulation Based Education
DOC.criteria: Operating room ( OR ) nurse St. Michael 's Hospital University Toronto Anesthesia Surgery Residents/Fellows OR nurse hospital Residents/Fellows program
